name: Genesis (itch) (cellochica)
description:
GENESIS DESCRIPTION

Genesis is an interactive portfolio-simulation game, where you can immerse yourself in multiple environments that showcase a range of skills, styles and aesthetics, including low-poly, stylised, vector work, outlined and more.   

This simulated environment serves as a sandbox where users can take a ‘museum virtual tour’ at their own pace with the freedom to explore whatever captures their attention. 

The environment consists of snapshots of the games I designed, including Hungry Eddy, Space Invaders Generation Alpha, Odyssey, Monstre, and Carnival Chaos. Each of the game rooms house the assets, environments and level-design I created for each of them.   

Genesis’ programming is based on the Unity 3D Game kit, whilst all environments, textures and 3D assets were created by myself. 

Genesis aims to challenge the standard static portfolio. 

It's interactive, playful and enticing.

Embark on a new adventure and venture into a realm of endless possibilities...

FEATURES
  • Third-person interactive portfolio 
  • Museum virtual tour
  • Showcase all recent games & 3D assets
FACTSHEET Developer:

Cécile Roux

Development & date:

Unity | 2023

Platforms:

Windows with Keyboard

Audience:

7+
